::Skulletron::

	"Oh, I see.  A new soldier eh?  That's great news.  For We Are Many!"

	Skulletron was getting bored from lack of action.  He couldn't wait to get
out onto the battlefield.

	"You can end the tour now.  You can go do whatever you do, if you need me
at all I will be hanging out at the bridge," Skulletron said as he walked
to the bridge.
